mapper.select: select m.id as m_id, m.name as m_name, m.specification as m_specification, m.unit as m_unit, m.storage as m_storage, m.remark as m_remark, m.status as m_status, c.id as c_id, c.name as c_name, c.code as c_code from tbl_material m, tbl_material_category c where m.status = '1' and m.categoryId = c.id and m.name = #{name} and m.categoryId = #{category} and m.specification = #{specification}
